EmailTemplate.name: 17.AMS.SmallCell.none.N.G.N.17207.Small Cells Campaign 2017.Email 4 - SC Indoor
EmailTemplate.subject: Seven ways to win new IoT business indoors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The easy way to connect hard-to-reach IoT devices We’ve identified seven Internet of Things (IoT) opportunities you can address today with small cells.
- Cover all floors of tall buildings - Add IoT coverage to macro network sites - Flexibly cover industrial sites
Discover the other four in our white paper. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
